title: LF Diamond+ Jungle for competitive Challenger team.
body:
**AnVaro is looking for a Diamond+ Jungler to complete the main roster.**

_We are currently Challenger 200LP (Rank 8 challenger)._

- Must have ts3 / Able to download
- Must be willing to play meta junglers
- Working mic & be vocal about calls.
- No toxicity & having maturity is essential.

Add either **AnV LittleOyster** or **AnV Matrix** in-game and we can discuss trial times (Won't be checking this post too much, so just add in-game).

replies.body: Hey dude, im a plat v pleb, not the best at this game, but im looking to improve and i am more then happy to play meta jungles for you guys. I am happy to learn and improve as a team.
